Section.Catchline: Lease of state-owned water bottoms for growing oysters and clams.

SectionBody.Text: Effective July 1, 1988, persons wishing to lease state-owned water bottoms for the purpose of growing oysters and clams shall no longer be required to apply under the provisions of s. 379.2525; such leases shall be issued pursuant to the provisions of ss. 253.67-253.75.
